title: China’s central bank vows to stamp out ‘illegal activities’ like trading in stablecoins
description:
Beijing has reaffirmed its tough stance on virtual currencies, warning of a resurgence in speculative trading and vowing to stamp out “illegal activities” involving stablecoins

title: China and inflation could pop Japanese PM Takaichi’s bubble
description:
